scripts.setup: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.dev: npm run dev:server & npm run dev:client
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:all: npm run build:client && echo 'Frontend built successfully!' && npm run build:server && echo 'Backend built successfully!'
